short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds Rheem affiliate code to all Amazon links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By installing this plugin you will automatically add the Rheem affiliate code to any Amazon links you find on the web. It will also add the code if you go directly to Amazon. 

What this means is that Rheem will receive between 4% & 15% of the value of your order each and every time you buy something from Amazon. The percentage varies depending on what you buy. 

So install the plugin and earn cash for Rheem while you shop!
